trans-unit.source: Displays a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> in which a check box is displayed to the left of each item.
trans-unit.target: 顯示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />，其中核取方塊顯示在各個項目的左邊。

trans-unit.source: This control presents a list of items that the user can navigate by using the keyboard or the scrollbar on the right side of the control.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項顯示使用者可以使用鍵盤或捲軸控制項右側巡覽的項目的清單。

trans-unit.source: The user can place a check mark by one or more items and the checked items can be navigated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以將核取記號放一個或多個項目和選取的項目可瀏覽與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>。

trans-unit.source: To add objects to the list at run time, assign an array of object references with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入至清單的物件，在執行階段，請將指派的物件參考陣列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The list then displays the default string value for each object.
trans-unit.target: 然後，此清單會顯示每個物件的預設字串值。

trans-unit.source: You can add individual items to the list with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將個別項目加入清單<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> object supports three states through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> enumeration: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Checked>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Indeterminate>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Unchecked>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>物件支援透過三種狀態<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>列舉型別： <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Checked>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Indeterminate>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Unchecked>。

trans-unit.source: You must set the state of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Indeterminate> in the code because the user interface for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> does not provide a mechanism to do so.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定狀態的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState.Indeterminate>程式碼中的使用者介面，因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>不提供一個機制來執行這項操作。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseTabStops%2A> is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> will recognize and expand tab characters in an item's text, creating columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseTabStops%2A>是`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>會辨識和展開項目的文字，建立資料行中的定位字元。

trans-unit.source: These tab stops are preset and cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 這些定位停駐點都有預設的而且無法變更。

trans-unit.source: To use custom tab stops, set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseTabStops%2A> to `false`, set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseCustomTabOffsets%2A> to `true`, and add the custom values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.CustomTabOffsets%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用自訂的定位停駐點，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseTabStops%2A>至`false`，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.UseCustomTabOffsets%2A>至`true`，並新增自訂值以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.CustomTabOffsets%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.UseCompatibleTextRendering%2A> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.CustomTabOffsets%2A> property will be ignored and replaced with standard tab offsets.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.UseCompatibleTextRendering%2A>屬性是`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.CustomTabOffsets%2A>屬性會被忽略，並取代標準索引標籤的位移。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> class supports the following three indexed collections:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>類別支援下列三個索引的集合：

trans-unit.source: Collection
trans-unit.target: 集合

trans-unit.source: Encapsulating Class
trans-unit.target: 封裝類別

trans-unit.source: All items contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的所有項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Checked items (including items in an indeterminate state), which is a subset of the items contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 已選取的項目 （包括處於不定狀態的項目），其項目子集包含在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Checked indexes, which is a subset of the indexes into the items collection.
trans-unit.target: 檢查索引，這是插入項目集合索引的子集。

trans-unit.source: These indexes specify items in a checked or indeterminate state.
trans-unit.target: 這些索引指定中已核取或是不定狀態的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following three tables are examples of the three indexed collections that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> class supports.
trans-unit.target: 下列三個資料表是三個索引集合的範例，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>類別支援。

trans-unit.source: The first table provides an example of the indexed collection of items in the control (all items contained in the control).
trans-unit.target: 第一個資料表會提供索引集合的項目控制項 （控制項中包含的所有項目） 中的範例。

trans-unit.source: Index
trans-unit.target: 索引

trans-unit.source: Item
trans-unit.target: 項目

trans-unit.source: Check State
trans-unit.target: 核取狀態

trans-unit.source: Object 1
trans-unit.target: 物件 1

trans-unit.source: Object 2
trans-unit.target: 物件 2

trans-unit.source: Object 3
trans-unit.target: 物件 3

trans-unit.source: Object 4
trans-unit.target: 物件 4

trans-unit.source: Object 5
trans-unit.target: 物件 5

trans-unit.source: The second table provides an example of the indexed collection of the checked items.
trans-unit.target: 第二個資料表會提供選取項目的索引集合的範例。

trans-unit.source: Index
trans-unit.target: 索引

trans-unit.source: Item
trans-unit.target: 項目

trans-unit.source: Object 2
trans-unit.target: 物件 2

trans-unit.source: Object 4
trans-unit.target: 物件 4

trans-unit.target: 物件 5

trans-unit.source: The third table provides an example of the indexed collection of indexes of checked items.
trans-unit.target: 第三個資料表會提供索引的選取項目的索引集合的範例。

trans-unit.source: Index
trans-unit.target: 索引

trans-unit.source: Index of Item
trans-unit.target: 項目的索引

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how you can use the methods, properties, and collections of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何使用方法、 屬性和集合的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>。

trans-unit.source: This is a complete sample ready to run once you have copied it to your project.
trans-unit.target: 這是完整的範例準備好要執行一旦您已將它複製到您的專案。

trans-unit.source: You can check and uncheck items, use the text box to add items and once you have clicked the save button, clear the checked items.
trans-unit.target: 您可以檢查及取消核取項目、 使用文字方塊來加入項目，一次您按一下儲存 按鈕，請清除核取的項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> and the `ResizeRedraw` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> to specify that the control is redrawn when resized.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A>和`ResizeRedraw`值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>指定調整大小時重繪控制項。

trans-unit.source: Collection of checked indexes in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> 中已選取索引的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection" /> collection for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of checked indexes is a subset of the indexes into the collection of all items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 已選取索引的集合是索引中的所有項目集合內的子集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: These indexes specify items in a checked or indeterminate state.
trans-unit.target: 這些索引指定中已核取或是不定狀態的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following example enumerates the checked items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> to see what check state an item is in.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會列舉中的選取項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>查看項目檢查狀態項目為。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndices%2A> property to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems%2A> property to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndices%2A>屬性來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems%2A>屬性來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The first loop uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A> method to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> of each checked item, given the index of the item.
trans-unit.target: 第一個迴圈會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>方法來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>的每個選取的項目，給定項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The second loop also uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>, but uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to retrieve the index for the item.
trans-unit.target: 第二個迴圈也會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>，但是會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來擷取項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: Collection of checked items in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> 中已選取項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection" /> collection for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection is a subset of the objects in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A> collection, representing only those items whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=nameWithType> is `Checked` or `Indeterminate`.
trans-unit.target: 集合是在物件子集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A>集合，表示只有項目其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=nameWithType>是`Checked`或`Indeterminate`。

trans-unit.source: The indexes in this collection are in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 此集合中的索引是以遞增順序。

trans-unit.source: The following example enumerates the checked items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> to see what check state an item is in.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會列舉中的選取項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>查看項目檢查狀態項目為。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndices%2A> property to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems%2A> property to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndices%2A>屬性來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems%2A>屬性來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The first loop uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A> method to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> of each checked item, given the index of the item.
trans-unit.target: 第一個迴圈會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>方法來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>的每個選取的項目，給定項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The second loop also uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>, but uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to retrieve the index for the item.
trans-unit.target: 第二個迴圈也會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>，但是會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來擷取項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，執行下列步驟：

trans-unit.source: Create a new Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: 新建 Windows Forms 應用程式

trans-unit.source: Add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> to the form.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>至表單。

trans-unit.source: Name the button `WhatIsChecked`, add a handler for its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event, and copy in the code from the body of the following handler.
trans-unit.target: 將按鈕`WhatIsChecked`，加入的處理常式其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件，並複製下列處理常式的本文中的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Add some items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 將某些項目加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>。

trans-unit.source: Run the example and check some of the check boxes in the list box.
trans-unit.target: 執行範例，並檢查部份清單方塊中的核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: Click the button.
trans-unit.target: 按一下按鈕。

trans-unit.source: You will see a series of message boxes that indicate which items were checked.
trans-unit.target: 您會看到一系列的訊息方塊，指出哪些項目簽入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the check box should be toggled when an item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示核取方塊是否應該在選取項目時切換。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the check mark is applied immediately; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果立即套用核取記號，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckOnClick%2A> indicates whether the check box should be toggled whenever an item is selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckOnClick%2A> 表示選取的項目時，是否應該切換核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: The default behavior is to change the selection on the first click, and then have the user click again to apply the check mark.
trans-unit.target: 預設行為是要變更的選項，第一次按，然後再按一次套用核取記號的使用者。

trans-unit.source: In some instances, however, you might prefer have the item checked as soon as it is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，不過，您可能會偏好已經選取項目時按下時。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates initializing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> control by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckOnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SelectionMode%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ThreeDCheckBoxes%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>藉由設定控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckOnClick%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SelectionMode%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ThreeDCheckBoxes%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The example populates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> with controls and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember%2A> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會填入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>控制項與集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember%2A>至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> named `CheckedListBox1` and call the `InitializeCheckListBox` method from the form's constructor or Load method.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例時，將下列程式碼貼中表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>名為`CheckedListBox1`呼叫`InitializeCheckListBox`方法從表單的建構函式或負載方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按一下 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> 控制項時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click> event passes an <xref:System.EventArgs> to its event handler, so it only indicates that a click has occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click>事件會傳遞<xref:System.EventArgs>至其事件處理常式，因此它只會顯示已發生按。

trans-unit.source: If you need more specific mouse information (such as the button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> events, which pass a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs> to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要更多滑鼠資訊 （例如 [] 按鈕點選、 滾輪旋轉或位置的數目），使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>傳遞的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: 按兩下是由使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定決定。

trans-unit.source: The user can adjust the amount of time that can pass between clicks during a double-click of a mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以調整，可以按兩下滑鼠按鍵的期間，按下之間經過時間的量。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click> event is raised every time the user double-clicks a control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click>每次使用者按兩下控制項，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have event-handling methods for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events of a form, the events are raised when the form is double-clicked and both event-handling methods are called.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您有事件處理方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>事件的表單中，按兩下表單時，會呼叫這兩個事件處理方法時，會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: If the user double-clicks a control that does not support the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> event, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click> event might be raised twice.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者按兩下控制項不支援<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>事件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click>事件可能會引發兩次。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> named `CheckedListBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>名為`CheckedListBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> 控制項建立新的協助工具物件。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />。

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有明確呼叫 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> 方法，將會在參考 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> 屬性時呼叫該方法。

trans-unit.source: To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>屬性，您必須加入參考`Accessibility`安裝.NET framework 組件。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CreateAccessibilityInstance" /> in a derived class, you should not call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CreateAccessibilityInstance" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CreateAccessibilityInstance" />在衍生類別中，您不應該呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CreateAccessibilityInstance" />方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the item collection.
trans-unit.target: 建立項目集合的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" /> that represents the new item collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" />，代表新的項目集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立控制代碼時，取得必要的建立參數。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> that contains the required parameters.
trans-unit.target: 包含所需參數的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A> property should not be overridden and used to adjust the properties of your derived control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A>屬性應該不會覆寫，用來調整衍生控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Properties such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Caption%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Width%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Height%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> should be set by the corresponding properties in your control such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 屬性，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Caption%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Width%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Height%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>應該設定在控制項中的對應屬性例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams> should only be extended when you are wrapping a standard Windows control class or to set styles not provided by the Windows Forms namespace.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams>應該只在會包裝在標準 Windows 控制項的類別或設定樣式不提供 Windows Form 的命名空間時才擴充。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating control parameters, see the `CreateWindow` and `CreateWindowEx` functions and the `CREATESTRUCT` structure documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: 如需建立控制項參數的詳細資訊，請參閱`CreateWindow`和`CreateWindowEx`函式和`CREATESTRUCT`結構中的 Windows Platform SDK 參考的文件位於 MSDN Library http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。

trans-unit.source: The following code example extends the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> derived class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將擴充<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is changed, which causes the button to display an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> rather than an <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性變更，因而導致按鈕以顯示<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>而不是<xref:System.Drawing.Image>。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a class that inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您具有類別繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>類別。

trans-unit.source: for operating with unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用於與 unmanaged 程式碼的作業。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams" /> property in a derived class, use the base class's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams" /> property to extend the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams" />屬性在衍生類別中，使用基底類別的<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams" />屬性擴充的基底實作。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you must provide all the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 否則，您必須提供所有的實作。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source for the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the source of the data.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示資料的來源。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DataSource" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DataSource" /> 屬性變更時。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that specifies a property of the objects contained in the list box whose contents you want to display.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定字串，該字串指定所要顯示清單方塊中所包含物件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the name of a property of the objects contained in the list box.
trans-unit.target: 字串，指定清單方塊中所包含物件的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: By default the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> displays the default string for the items it contains.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>顯示它所包含之項目的預設字串。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> can display diverse types of objects and you may want to change the displayed string by specifying the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>可以顯示不同類型的物件，您可能想要變更顯示的字串，藉由指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the specified property does not exist, or the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember%2A> property is an empty string (""), the results of the object's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ToString%2A> method are displayed instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的屬性不存在，或值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember%2A>屬性為空字串 ("")，物件的結果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ToString%2A>方法會改為顯示。

trans-unit.source: If the new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember%2A> cannot be set, the previous value is maintained.
trans-unit.target: 如果新值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember%2A>無法設定，先前的值保持不變。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates initializing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> control by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckOnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SelectionMode%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ThreeDCheckBoxes%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>藉由設定控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckOnClick%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SelectionMode%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ThreeDCheckBoxes%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The example populates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> with controls and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember%2A> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會填入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>控制項與集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember%2A>至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> named `CheckedListBox1` and call the `InitializeCheckListBox` method from the form's constructor or Load method.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例時，將下列程式碼貼中表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>名為`CheckedListBox1`呼叫`InitializeCheckListBox`方法從表單的建構函式或負載方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DisplayMember" /> 屬性變更時。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a visual aspect of an owner-drawn <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於主控描繪 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> 的視覺外觀變更時。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: This event is used by an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此事件由描繪<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The event is raised only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件時，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform the tasks needed to draw items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個事件來執行繪製項目所需的工作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>。

trans-unit.source: If you have a variable-sized item (that is, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable?displayProperty=nameWithType>), the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.MeasureItem> event is raised before the item is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有可變動大小的項目 (也就是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A>設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable?displayProperty=nameWithType>)、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.MeasureItem>項目會繪製之前，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.MeasureItem> event to specify the size for the item that you are going to draw in your event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawItem> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.MeasureItem>事件，以指定要繪製的事件處理常式中的項目大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawItem>事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the mode for drawing elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> 繪製項目的模式。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Always a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode" /> of <see langword="Normal" />.
trans-unit.target: 永遠為 <see langword="Normal" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: The index of the item.
trans-unit.target: 項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the specified item is checked.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，表示指定的項目是否已選取。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the item is checked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目已經核取，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemChecked%2A> returns `true` if the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> is `Checked` or `Indeterminate` for the item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemChecked%2A> 傳回`true`如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>是`Checked`或`Indeterminate`項目。

trans-unit.source: To determine the specific state the item is in, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷在項目處於特定狀態，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> specified is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <paramref name="index" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="index" /> specified is greater than or equal to the count of items in the list.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <paramref name="index" /> 大於或等於清單中項目的計數。

trans-unit.source: The index of the item to get the checked value of.
trans-unit.target: 要取得其選取值之項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating the check state of the current item.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指示目前項目之選取狀態的值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A> method provides the ability to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> value of an item, given the index.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>方法可讓您取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>項目的值，給定的索引。

trans-unit.source: If you never set the check state of an item to `Indeterminate`, then use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemChecked%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果從未設定的項目核取狀態`Indeterminate`，然後使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemChecked%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example enumerates the checked items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> to see what check state an item is in.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會列舉中的選取項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>查看項目檢查狀態項目為。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A> method to set the check state of an item.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>方法，以設定項目的核取狀態。

trans-unit.source: The example also demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndices%2A> property to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems%2A> property to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndices%2A>屬性來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems%2A>屬性來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The first loop uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A> method to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> of each checked item, given the index of the item.
trans-unit.target: 第一個迴圈會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>方法來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>的每個選取的項目，給定項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The second loop also uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>, but uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to retrieve the index for the item.
trans-unit.target: 第二個迴圈也會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>，但是會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來擷取項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> specified is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <paramref name="index" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="index" /> specified is greater than or equal to the count of items in the list.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <paramref name="index" /> 大於或等於清單中項目的計數。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the checked state of an item changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於項目的已勾選狀態變更時。

trans-unit.source: The check state is not updated until after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ItemCheck> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 核取狀態才會更新之後<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ItemCheck>就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ItemCheck> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ItemCheck>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> named `CheckedListBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>名為`CheckedListBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ItemCheck> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ItemCheck>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the item area.
trans-unit.target: 取得項目區域的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the item area.
trans-unit.target: 項目區域的高度，單位為像素。

trans-unit.source: This measurement is based on the font height plus a small margin to provide white space around the item.
trans-unit.target: 這個度量單位根據字型高度，再加上提供項目周圍的空白字元的小邊界。

trans-unit.source: The extenders of characters such as "g" and "y" do not display properly when the font is changed to 9.75-point Arial.
trans-unit.target: "G"或"y"等字元的擴充項不會正確顯示 9.75 點新細明體字型變更時。

trans-unit.source: To correct this, derive a class from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> and override <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ItemHeight%2A> to return `base.ItemHeight+2`.
trans-unit.target: 若要修正此問題，可以衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>並覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ItemHeight%2A>傳回`base.ItemHeight+2`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of items in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> 中的項目集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection" /> collection representing the items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection" /> 中項目的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A> property enables you to obtain a reference to the list of items that are currently stored in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A>屬性可讓您取得的目前儲存在中的項目清單的參考<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: With this reference, you can add items, remove items, and obtain a count of the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 與這個參考中，您可以將項目加入、 移除項目，並取得集合中的項目計數。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the item collection, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection> class reference topics.
trans-unit.target: 多個可以與項目集合執行的工作的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection>類別參考主題。

trans-unit.source: The following example enumerates the checked items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection> to see what check state an item is in.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會列舉中的選取項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>查看項目檢查狀態項目為。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A> property to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection> to retrieve the index of an item using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A>屬性來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection>要擷取的項目使用索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example also demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndices%2A> property to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems%2A> property to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndices%2A>屬性來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection>，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItems%2A>屬性來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckedItemCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The first loop uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A> method to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> of each checked item, given the index of the item.
trans-unit.target: 第一個迴圈會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>方法來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>的每個選取的項目，給定項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The second loop also uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>, but uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to retrieve the index for the item.
trans-unit.target: 第二個迴圈也會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.GetItemCheckState%2A>，但是會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來擷取項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an owner-drawn <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> is created and the sizes of the list items are determined.
trans-unit.target: 發生於建立主控描繪 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 和決定清單項目的大小時。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for this event to specify the size of an item before it is drawn in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawItem> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立此事件，以指定項目的大小，它繪製前的事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawItem>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event is raised only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable>.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件時，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.DrawMode%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable>。

trans-unit.source: The maximum height of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> item is 255 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 最大高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>項目為 255 的像素。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> control with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者用滑鼠按一下 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox" /> 控制項時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.MouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.MouseClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> named `CheckedListBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>名為`CheckedListBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.MouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.MouseClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Click" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.OnClick%2A> method selects or clears the check box of the item that is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.OnClick%2A>方法選取或清除核取方塊，按下的項目。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckOnClick%2A> property is set to `true`, the check box is switched from a selected or cleared state the first time the item is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.CheckOnClick%2A>屬性設定為`true`，從 選取或清除狀態第一次按一下項目切換核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the check box is switched only if the item is already selected.
trans-unit.target: 否則，只有當已選取的項目，會切換核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.OnClick%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.OnClick%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.OnClick(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.OnClick(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.OnClick(System.EventArgs)" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.OnClick(System.EventArgs)" />方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property determines whether one item in the list box can be selected or no items can be selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SelectionMode%2A>屬性會決定是否可以選取清單方塊中的一個項目，或可以選取任何項目。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> objects, multiple selection is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>物件，不支援多重選取。

trans-unit.source: You can set the mode to one item or no items.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將一個項目或沒有項目模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState" /> for the item at the specified index to <see langword="Checked" />.
trans-unit.target: 將指定索引處項目的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState" /> 設為 <see langword="Checked" />。

trans-unit.source: When a value of `true` is passed, this method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> value to `Checked`.
trans-unit.target: 值時`true`傳遞，則這個方法設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>值設定為`Checked`。

trans-unit.source: A value of `false` sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> to `Unchecked`.
trans-unit.target: 值為`false`設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>至`Unchecked`。

trans-unit.source: The following example enumerates the items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> and checks every other item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會列舉中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>和檢查清單中的項目。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemCheckState%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemChecked%2A> methods to set the check state of an item.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemCheckState%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemChecked%2A>設定項目的核取狀態的方法。

trans-unit.source: For every other item that is to be checked, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemCheckState%2A> is called to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> to `Indeterminate`, while <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemChecked%2A> is called on the other item to set the checked state to `Checked`.
trans-unit.target: 每個其他項目，將檢查<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemCheckState%2A>呼叫以設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>至`Indeterminate`，雖然<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.SetItemChecked%2A>已檢查的狀態設定為其他項目上呼叫`Checked`。

trans-unit.source: The example also demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A> property to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection> to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Count%2A> of items.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.Items%2A>屬性來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox.ObjectCollection>取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Count%2A>的項目。

The index is greater than the count of items in the list.

trans-unit.target: 要設定其狀態之項目的索引。

trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer" /> class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，決定要使用 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 類別 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) 還是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer" /> 類別 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) 來呈現文字。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> class should be used to perform text rendering for compatibility with versions 1.0 and 1.1.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />類別應該用來執行與 1.0 和 1.1 版的相容性的文字轉譯。

trans-unit.source: of the .NET Framework; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework。否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.
trans-unit.target: `UseCompatibleTextRendering`屬性為了提供 visual Windows Form 控制項之間的相容性呈現文字使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>類別和[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]應用程式，執行自訂文字轉譯使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>類別。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，如果您的應用程式未從升級[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]，建議您保持`UseCompatibleTextRendering`設定的預設值為`false`。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]基礎<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>類別中引進了[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]為了提升效能，讓文字看起來比較好，並改善的國際字型支援。

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class was used to perform all text rendering.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]基礎<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>類別用來執行所有的文字轉譯。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 計算字元間距和自動換行以不同的方式從[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: In a Windows Forms application that uses the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> to appear different from the other text in the application.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Form 應用程式中使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>類別來呈現文字中，這可能會導致使用的控制項的文字<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>出現不同的應用程式中的其他文字。

trans-unit.source: To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control.
trans-unit.target: 若要解決此不相容，您可以設定`UseCompatibleTextRendering`屬性`true`特定控制項。

trans-unit.source: To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method with a parameter of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定`UseCompatibleTextRendering`至`true`應用程式中所有支援的控制項，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>具有參數的方法`true`。

trans-unit.source: Actual constant values can be found in the Windows.h header file included in the Platform SDK (Core SDK section) download, which is also available in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
